translated: The doum palm (botanical genus Hyphaene) are African palm trees which the best known is the dom of Egypt (Hyphaene thebaica), which has the distinction of having a branched trunk, which is very rare in palms.
original: Les palmiers doums (genre botanique Hyphaene) sont des palmiers africains dont le plus connu est le doum d’Égypte (Hyphaene thebaica), qui a la particularité d'avoir un tronc ramifié, ce qui est très rare chez les palmiers.
